097    /**
098     * XStream (http://xstream.codehaus.org/) based XML configuration class.
099     * 
100     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
101     * 
102     */
103    public class XMLConfigurer implements Configurer
104    {
105            protected static final class AssertCheckConverter implements Converter
106            {
107                    /**
108                     * {@inheritDoc}
109                     */
110                    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
111                    public boolean canConvert(final Class clazz)
112                    {
113                            return clazz.equals(AssertCheck.class);
114                    }
115    
116                    /**
117                     * {@inheritDoc}
118                     */
119                    public void marshal(final Object value, final HierarchicalStreamWriter writer, final MarshallingContext context)
120                    {
121                            final AssertCheck assertCheck = (AssertCheck) value;
122                            writer.addAttribute("lang", assertCheck.getLang());
123                            writer.addAttribute("message", assertCheck.getMessage());
124                            writer.addAttribute("errorCode", assertCheck.getErrorCode());
125                            writer.addAttribute("severity", Integer.toString(assertCheck.getSeverity()));
126                            writer.startNode("expr");
127                            writer.setValue(assertCheck.getExpr());
128                            writer.endNode();
129                            final String[] profiles = assertCheck.getProfiles();
130                            if (profiles != null && profiles.length > 0)
131                            {
132                                    writer.startNode("profiles");
133                                    for (final String profile : profiles)
134                                    {
135                                            writer.startNode("string");
136                                            writer.setValue(profile);
137                                            writer.endNode();
138                                    }
139                                    writer.endNode();
140                            }
141                    }
142    
143                    /**
144                     * {@inheritDoc}
145                     */
146                    public Object unmarshal(final HierarchicalStreamReader reader, final UnmarshallingContext context)
147                    {
148                            final AssertCheck assertCheck = new AssertCheck();
149                            assertCheck.setLang(reader.getAttribute("lang"));
150                            assertCheck.setMessage(reader.getAttribute("message"));
151                            assertCheck.setErrorCode(reader.getAttribute("errorCode"));
152                            if (reader.getAttribute("severity") != null)
153                            {
154                                    assertCheck.setSeverity(Integer.parseInt(reader.getAttribute("severity")));
155                            }
156    
157                            reader.moveDown();
158                            assertCheck.setExpr(reader.getValue());
159                            reader.moveUp();
160                            if (reader.hasMoreChildren())
161                            {
162                                    reader.moveDown();
163                                    final List<String> profiles = new ArrayList<String>(4);
164                                    while (reader.hasMoreChildren())
165                                    {
166                                            reader.moveDown();
167                                            if ("string".equals(reader.getNodeName()))
168                                            {
169                                                    profiles.add(reader.getValue());
170                                            }
171                                            reader.moveUp();
172                                    }
173                                    reader.moveUp();
174                                    assertCheck.setProfiles(profiles.toArray(new String[profiles.size()]));
175                            }
176                            return assertCheck;
177                    }
178            }
179    
180            protected static final class ListConverter extends CollectionConverter
181            {
182                    protected ListConverter(final Mapper mapper)
183                    {
184                            super(mapper);
185                    }
186    
187                    /**
188                     * {@inheritDoc}
189                     */
190                    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
191                    @Override
192                    public boolean canConvert(final Class type)
193                    {
194                            return List.class.isAssignableFrom(type);
195                    }
196            }
197    
198            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
199    
200            private POJOConfigurer pojoConfigurer = new POJOConfigurer();
201    
202            private final XStream xStream;
203    
204            /**
205             * creates an XMLConfigurer instance backed by a new XStream instance 
206             * using the com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.StaxDriver for XML parsing 
207             * if the StAX API is available
208             * @see com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.StaxDriver
209             */
210            public XMLConfigurer()
211            {
212                    // new com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.PureJavaReflectionProvider()
213    
214                    final HierarchicalStreamDriver xmlDriver = //
215                    ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader") ? new StaxDriver() : //
216                                    ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("org.xmlpull.mxp1.MXParser") ? new XppDriver() : //
217                                                    new DomDriver();
218    
219                    xStream = new XStream(xmlDriver);
220                    configureXStream();
221            }
222    
223            private final void configureXStream()
224            {
225                    xStream.registerConverter(new ListConverter(xStream.getMapper()));
226                    xStream.registerConverter(new AssertCheckConverter());
227    
228                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Class.class);
229                    xStream.useAttributeFor(boolean.class);
230                    xStream.useAttributeFor(byte.class);
231                    xStream.useAttributeFor(char.class);
232                    xStream.useAttributeFor(double.class);
233                    xStream.useAttributeFor(float.class);
234                    xStream.useAttributeFor(int.class);
235                    xStream.useAttributeFor(long.class);
236                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Boolean.class);
237                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Byte.class);
238                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Character.class);
239                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Double.class);
240                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Float.class);
241                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Integer.class);
242                    xStream.useAttributeFor(Long.class);
243                    xStream.useAttributeFor(String.class);
244    
245                    xStream.alias("java-type", Class.class);
246    
247                    // constraint check short forms
248                    xStream.alias("assert", AssertCheck.class);
249                    xStream.alias("assertConstraintSet", AssertConstraintSetCheck.class);
250                    xStream.alias("assertFalse", AssertFalseCheck.class);
251                    xStream.alias("assertFieldConstraints", AssertFieldConstraintsCheck.class);
252                    xStream.alias("assertTrue", AssertTrueCheck.class);
253                    {
254                            xStream.alias("assertURL", AssertURLCheck.class);
255                            xStream.alias("permittedURIScheme", URIScheme.class);
256                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(AssertURLCheck.class, "permittedURISchemes", URIScheme.class);
257                    }
258                    xStream.alias("assertValid", AssertValidCheck.class);
259                    xStream.alias("checkWith", CheckWithCheck.class);
260                    xStream.alias("email", EmailCheck.class);
261                    xStream.alias("equalToField", EqualToFieldCheck.class);
262                    xStream.alias("future", FutureCheck.class);
263                    xStream.alias("hasSubstring", HasSubstringCheck.class);
264                    xStream.alias("instanceOf", InstanceOfCheck.class);
265                    xStream.alias("instanceOfAny", InstanceOfAnyCheck.class);
266                    xStream.alias("length", LengthCheck.class);
267                    {
268                            xStream.alias("matchPattern", MatchPatternCheck.class);
269                            xStream.alias("pattern", Pattern.class);
270                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(MatchPatternCheck.class, "patterns", Pattern.class);
271                    }
272                    xStream.alias("max", MaxCheck.class);
273                    xStream.alias("maxLength", MaxLengthCheck.class);
274                    xStream.alias("maxSize", MaxSizeCheck.class);
275                    xStream.alias("memberOf", MemberOfCheck.class);
276                    xStream.alias("min", MinCheck.class);
277                    xStream.alias("minLength", MinLengthCheck.class);
278                    xStream.alias("minSize", MinSizeCheck.class);
279                    xStream.alias("noSelfReference", NoSelfReferenceCheck.class);
280                    xStream.alias("notBlank", NotBlankCheck.class);
281                    xStream.alias("notEmpty", NotEmptyCheck.class);
282                    xStream.alias("notEqual", NotEqualCheck.class);
283                    xStream.alias("notEqualToField", NotEqualToFieldCheck.class);
284                    xStream.alias("notMemberOf", NotMemberOfCheck.class);
285                    xStream.alias("notNegative", NotNegativeCheck.class);
286                    xStream.alias("notNull", NotNullCheck.class);
287                    xStream.alias("past", PastCheck.class);
288                    xStream.alias("range", RangeCheck.class);
289                    xStream.alias("simpleCheck", SimpleCheck.class);
290                    xStream.alias("size", SizeCheck.class);
291                    xStream.alias("validateWithMethod", ValidateWithMethodCheck.class);
292    
293                    // check exclusions short forms
294                    xStream.alias("nullable", NullableExclusion.class);
295    
296                    // <oval> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.POJOConfigurer
297                    xStream.alias("oval", POJOConfigurer.class);
298                    {
299                            // <constraintSet> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ConstraintSetConfiguration
300                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(POJOConfigurer.class, "constraintSetConfigurations",
301                                            ConstraintSetConfiguration.class);
302                            xStream.alias("constraintSet", ConstraintSetConfiguration.class);
303                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(ConstraintSetConfiguration.class, "checks");
304    
305                            // <class> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ClassConfiguration
306                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(POJOConfigurer.class, "classConfigurations", ClassConfiguration.class);
307                            xStream.alias("class", ClassConfiguration.class);
308                            {
309                                    // <object> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ObjectConfiguration
310                                    xStream.aliasField("object", ClassConfiguration.class, "objectConfiguration");
311                                    {
312                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(ObjectConfiguration.class, "checks");
313                                    }
314                                    // <field> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.FieldConfiguration
315                                    xStream
316                                                    .addImplicitCollection(ClassConfiguration.class, "fieldConfigurations",
317                                                                    FieldConfiguration.class);
318                                    xStream.alias("field", FieldConfiguration.class);
319                                    xStream.addImplicitCollection(FieldConfiguration.class, "checks");
320    
321                                    // <parameter> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ParameterConfiguration
322                                    // used within ConstructorConfiguration and MethodConfiguration
323                                    xStream.alias("parameter", ParameterConfiguration.class);
324                                    xStream.addImplicitCollection(ParameterConfiguration.class, "checks", Check.class);
325                                    xStream.addImplicitCollection(ParameterConfiguration.class, "checkExclusions", CheckExclusion.class);
326    
327                                    // <constructor> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ConstructorConfiguration
328                                    xStream.addImplicitCollection(ClassConfiguration.class, "constructorConfigurations",
329                                                    ConstructorConfiguration.class);
330                                    xStream.alias("constructor", ConstructorConfiguration.class);
331                                    {
332                                            // <parameter> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ParameterConfiguration
333                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(ConstructorConfiguration.class, "parameterConfigurations",
334                                                            ParameterConfiguration.class);
335                                    }
336    
337                                    // <method> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.MethodConfiguration
338                                    xStream.addImplicitCollection(ClassConfiguration.class, "methodConfigurations",
339                                                    MethodConfiguration.class);
340                                    xStream.alias("method", MethodConfiguration.class);
341                                    {
342                                            // <parameter> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.ParameterConfiguration
343                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(MethodConfiguration.class, "parameterConfigurations",
344                                                            ParameterConfiguration.class);
345    
346                                            // <returnValue> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.MethodConfiguration.returnValueConfiguration
347                                            // -> MethodReturnValueConfiguration
348                                            xStream.aliasField("returnValue", MethodConfiguration.class, "returnValueConfiguration");
349                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(MethodReturnValueConfiguration.class, "checks", Check.class);
350    
351                                            // <pre> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.MethodConfiguration.preExecutionConfiguration ->
352                                            // MethodPreExecutionConfiguration
353                                            xStream.aliasField("preExecution", MethodConfiguration.class, "preExecutionConfiguration");
354                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(MethodPreExecutionConfiguration.class, "checks", PreCheck.class);
355                                            xStream.alias("pre", PreCheck.class);
356    
357                                            // <post> -> net.sf.oval.configuration.elements.MethodConfiguration.postExecutionConfiguration ->
358                                            // MethodPpstExecutionConfiguration
359                                            xStream.aliasField("postExcecution", MethodConfiguration.class, "postExecutionConfiguration");
360                                            xStream.addImplicitCollection(MethodPostExecutionConfiguration.class, "checks", PostCheck.class);
361                                            xStream.alias("post", PostCheck.class);
362                                    }
363                            }
364                    }
365            }
366    
367            public void fromXML(final File input) throws IOException
368            {
369                    final BufferedInputStream bis = new BufferedInputStream(new FileInputStream(input));
370                    try
371                    {
372                            fromXML(bis);
373                    }
374                    finally
375                    {
376                            bis.close();
377                    }
378            }
379    
380            public void fromXML(final InputStream input)
381            {
382                    pojoConfigurer = (POJOConfigurer) xStream.fromXML(input);
383            }
384    
385            public void fromXML(final Reader input)
386            {
387                    pojoConfigurer = (POJOConfigurer) xStream.fromXML(input);
388            }
389    
390            public void fromXML(final String input)
391            {
392                    pojoConfigurer = (POJOConfigurer) xStream.fromXML(input);
393            }
394    
395            /**
396             * {@inheritDoc}
397             */
398            public ClassConfiguration getClassConfiguration(final Class< ? > clazz) throws InvalidConfigurationException
399            {
400                    return pojoConfigurer.getClassConfiguration(clazz);
401            }
402    
403            /**
404             * {@inheritDoc}
405             */
406            public ConstraintSetConfiguration getConstraintSetConfiguration(final String constraintSetId)
407                            throws InvalidConfigurationException
408            {
409                    return pojoConfigurer.getConstraintSetConfiguration(constraintSetId);
410            }
411    
412            /**
413             * @return the pojoConfigurer
414             */
415            public POJOConfigurer getPojoConfigurer()
416            {
417                    return pojoConfigurer;
418            }
419    
420            /**
421             * @return the xStream
422             */
423            public XStream getXStream()
424            {
425                    return xStream;
426            }
427    
428            /**
429             * @param pojoConfigurer the pojoConfigurer to set
430             */
431            public void setPojoConfigurer(final POJOConfigurer pojoConfigurer)
432            {
433                    this.pojoConfigurer = pojoConfigurer;
434            }
435    
436            public synchronized String toXML()
437            {
438                    return xStream.toXML(pojoConfigurer);
439            }
440    
441            public synchronized void toXML(final OutputStream out)
442            {
443                    xStream.toXML(pojoConfigurer, out);
444            }
445    
446            public synchronized void toXML(final Writer out)
447            {
448                    xStream.toXML(pojoConfigurer, out);
449            }
